tests.comment: App is mostly fine but can have some text rendering bugs and crashes in some places such as entering TV settings.
tests.author: emiyl
tests.log:

tests.comment: App seems to be mostly fine, however it crashes if you try to select something with the joystick. R5G6B5_UNORM_PACK16 not supported.
tests.author: emiyl
